import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, FormControl, Navbar, Card, InputGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngleLeft, faAngleRight } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import imgFairPrice from '../img/FairPrice-Logo.png'; import imgSMS from '../img/SMS.png'; import imgDetails from '../img/Contact-Details.png'; import imgSuccess from '../img/Success-Applied.png'; class Home extends Component { state = { totaljobs: "", apiUrl: "https://feed.fastjobs.ph/jobs/search?skip_key=1", apiKeyUrl: "&keyword=", keySearch: "", tags: ['tag 1', 'tag 2', 'tag 3'], counters: [ { id:1, value:4 }, { id:2, value:0 }, { id:3, value:0 }, { id:4, value:0 } ], activeStep: "Number", homeTiles:[], jobBanner: "", jobDescHtml: '

Job Responsibilities

Working Hours

  • 6 days work week (including Weekends & Public Holidays)
  • Rotating shift
    • - Full-Time: 7am–3pm / 3pm–11pm
    • - Part-Time: 7am–12pm / 12pm–5pm / 5pm–10pm
  • Permanent night shift (11pm–7am) position available
', stepApply: "", stepNumber: "hide", mobType: "text", //text or password mobMsg: "HIDE" //SHOW or HIDE } getData() { if (localStorage.getItem('newData')) { var savData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('newData')); var locData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('homeTiles')); if (savData.jobid) { var savJobId = savData.jobid; var locJobs = locData.data; if (locJobs.length > 0) { for (var i = 0; i < locJobs.length; i++) { if (locJobs[i].jobid === savJobId) { this.setState({ jobBanner: locJobs[i].bannerurl }); this.setState({ jobDescHtml: locJobs[i].desc }); } } } } } } handleApiRequest() { console.log('Mode:',process.env.NODE_ENV); console.log("Rendered API Request"); } backStep() { window.location.href = "home"; } nextStep(status) { if (status === "apply") { this.setState({ stepApply:"hide", stepNumber:"" }); } console.log(status); } componentDidMount() { this.getData(); this.handleApiRequest(); } render() { return (
this.backStep()} >
this.backStep()}>
this.nextStep('apply')} > Apply Now
Verification
Please enter your mobile number and we will send you the verification.
Mobile Number
{ this.state.mobMsg }
Verification Code
Next
); } } export default Home;
